I thoroughly enjoyed it and recommend you give it a shot with its amazing portal and physics based gameplay that make you think with your brain and most importantly makes you think with portals you should throw yourself into the Aperture Science Labs and do some portal science in this wonderful experience that I recommend to any and all people for a genuinely amazing puzzle game experience

I think I finished the game over several days although took me 7 hours to complete overall. 

 It was satisfying finishing the last level.  i would be interested in eventually playing portal 2. I had never played a game like it before with puzzles and use of motion with that. 

I will note I scare easily, so i found some elements quite creepy (which is why I didn't finish playing in 1 day), e.g. the robotic voice heard nearer the end.

Portal is a marvelous classic masterpiece of a game.
The story is simple, yes, but it is still a fun puzzle/action game. (Not sure how to categorize it..)
I've always prefered the sequel, but I still love this first opus wholeheartedly. 
♥

This game is absolutely amazing!  Great story, fun puzzles, and an all around good time.

Portal is a masterpiece. The puzzles are slick and elegant, the story is compelling and the dialogue is consistently witty and funny, one of the hardest things to accomplish in a game. It doesn't overstay it's welcome with it's relatively short play time, and it remains one of the best puzzle games ever created, even now in 2020.

Sur la totalité du temps joué, je dois être à 20/25 % d'attente liée à ces bugs, est-ce à cause de windows 10?
EDIT : injouable en défi, freeze 30 scd toutes les 2 tentatives aucun réglage n'a d'impact.

This game is extremely fun and I highly recommend purchasing it. The voice lines are witty, there are hidden secrets and jokes scattered all around the game, and it is short and sweet. This is also a great game for speedrunners. There are extra bonus challenge maps and advanced maps. Unfortunately the story is not as dense as it`s successor game, Portal 2, but it still is very fun and exiting. Some say that the puzzle genre is just not for them but i think that getting a hang of portals is very easy.

I love this game, ive beaten it about 10 times and the portal mechanic was revolutionary for its time, obviously portal 2 is better because of the technological advance but Its still an instant classic

Тогда как Portal 2 завязана на том, чтобы рассказать историю, Portal завязан на решении головоломок при помощи новых механик.
Сюжетка проходится очень быстро - не более чем за полтора часа, если играете впервые - и выглядит достаточно сухо. После прохождения открываются бонусные испытания, которые [i]гораздо[/i] сложнее и, я думаю, интереснее основной игры. Ради них Portal стоило купить.
Графика... реалистичная. Оформление уровней по мере прохождения сменяется с аскетичного на очень детальное. Текстуры, цветное освещение и небольшой fog почти везде выполнены прекрасно и уместно. Настройки графики очень гибкие.
В игре есть прекрасная музыка. Иногда её можно и не заметить, конечно. В основном она служит для создания атмосферы неясности и безысходности или для поддержания напряженности.
Основные и революционные механики игры, а также возможность моддинга, оставлю без комментариев - тут всё ясно.

Крутая игра всем советую 10/10

8/10

Selamlar dostlar! Steam'de dolaşırken aynı zamanda oyun arayışı içerisindeydim. Sonra aklıma youtube animasyonlarından dolayı ilk aklıma Portal geldi. Bende dedim bir alayım oynayayım ve Portal Bundle aldım. Oyun incelemelerine çok kısa yazmışlar 4 saat de bittiği hakkında doğru olarak. Ama bana hiç kısa gelmedi bazı yerlerde o kadar çok zaman geçirdim ki neyse oynamanızı şiddetle tavsiye ederim. Ve evet Oyun 4 saat de bitiyor. (İnceleme iğrenç oldu ama neyse)
Смотрел конечную заставку дольше, чем проходил игру.

考验立体空间逻辑的射击游戏，这妥妥的益智游戏。
雪儿逃离并最终摧毁格拉Dos，但是结尾歌曲中Dos没死。
15学会重力加速跳跃后面很多地方就容易通过了。地图不晕但是穿来穿去还真的有点晕，忍吐分3次才通关。
夏促买的，小游戏真香，准备去玩2。

Есть моменты с багами...Но это пустяк...Всего-то нужно пройти карту заново.
Игра крута своими головоломками порталов. ;)
Короткая игра, но интересная

Absolutely amazing game. I finished the story quickly and am really glad that Portal 2 exists. Even though the second is (in my opinion) better, I recently found more content in the first than I originally thought, so that was a nice surprise. Something about it feels almost timeless.

Le gameplay bien rodé qui pose la question : "comment ils ont réussi a faire un jeu aussi génial ?", dont on a la réponse dans les commentaires ajoutés après avoir fini le jeu: avec beaucoup de travail.
Le jeu en lui même n'est pas si long mais réussir les succès et les maps avancées rajoutent une difficulté mais surtout reussir les défis à 100% est vraiment vraiment dur ! Il faut finir une Map avec le moins de portail, temps ou pas possibles et c'est horriblement difficile de comprendre comment faire ! (Pour moi en tout cas mais je suis stupide)

Very clever game.  They have you do some VERY complicated puzzles using the portal system, but the game is so well designed that 1) very little explicit instruction is provided and 2) the level progression has you steadily build skills that make the puzzles comprehensible.
Incredible!! Use your brain for solve some puzzles, and better... "Still Alive"

Super entertaining. Moderately challenging from a problem resolution point of view while a deeper, darker super interesting story unfolds.

Portal is so much fun, constant puzzles that are always challenging but never too frustrating, especially as someone who doesn't play many games. The game also runs fine on my cheap old laptop! It took me 11 hours to do the main story, and I'm excited to play the bonus maps and Portal 2. I highly recommend!
